类 CurrentAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
      • CurrentAccount
  • public class CurrentAccount
extends BankAccount
    Current account class inherits BankAccount class. And it overwrites some methods.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      CurrentAccount​(java.lang.String accNo, java.lang.String accName, double balance, double overdraft)
      The constructor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      int close()
      Close account, check overdraft use and call superclass's close function
      java.lang.String deposit​(double amount, java.lang.String type)
      Deposit money into current account, then check overdraft and repay overdraft
      double getOverdraft()
      Get the account overdraft
      void repayOverdraft()
      Check balance and overdraft, if overdraft is used and balance is not 0, repay overdraft
      int withdraw​(double amount)
      Withdraw money from current account, current account can use overdraft when balance is insufficient

      • 从类继承的方法 BankAccount

        checkStatus, getAccountName, getAccountNo, getBalance, getNo, getStatus, getType, reinstate, suspend

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CurrentAccount

        public CurrentAccount​(java.lang.String accNo,
                      java.lang.String accName,
                      double balance,
                      double overdraft)
        The constructor
        参数:
        accNo - account No.
        accName - account name
        balance - account balance
        overdraft - account overdraft

    • 方法详细资料

      • deposit

        public java.lang.String deposit​(double amount,
                                java.lang.String type)
        Deposit money into current account, then check overdraft and repay overdraft
        覆盖:
        deposit 在类中 BankAccount
        参数:
        amount - the deposit amount
        type - the deposit type: cleared and un-cleared
        返回:
        deposit state

      • withdraw

        public int withdraw​(double amount)
        Withdraw money from current account, current account can use overdraft when balance is insufficient
        覆盖:
        withdraw 在类中 BankAccount
        参数:
        amount - the withdraw money
        返回:
        withdraw state

      • repayOverdraft

        public void repayOverdraft()
        Check balance and overdraft, if overdraft is used and balance is not 0, repay overdraft

      • close

        public int close()
        Close account, check overdraft use and call superclass's close function
        覆盖:
        close 在类中 BankAccount
        返回:
        close account state, 1 means having balance, 0 means success

      • getOverdraft

        public double getOverdraft()
        Get the account overdraft
        返回:
        account overdraft
